00042 #include <iostream>

00044 #include "Vector3D.h"

00046 struct Point3D;
00047 struct Vector3D;
00048 
00049 struct Ray
00050 {
00051     Ray( );

00056         
00057     Point3D origin;
00058     Vector3D direction;

00060     mutable double maxt;
